40#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
41# include "config.h"
42#endif
43
44#include <sys/cdefs.h>
45__RCSID("$NetBSD: pam_close_session.c,v 1.3 2017/05/06 19:50:09 christos Exp $");
46
47#include <sys/param.h>
48
49#include <security/pam_appl.h>
50
51#include "openpam_impl.h"
52
53/*
54 * XSSO 4.2.1
55 * XSSO 6 page 40
56 *
57 * Close an existing user session
58 */
59
60int
61pam_close_session(pam_handle_t *pamh,
62 int flags)
63{
64 int r;
65
66 ENTER();
67 if (flags & ~(PAM_SILENT))
68 RETURNC(PAM_BAD_CONSTANT);
69 r = openpam_dispatch(pamh, PAM_SM_CLOSE_SESSION, flags);
70 RETURNC(r);
71}
72
73/*
74 * Error codes:
75 *
76 * =openpam_dispatch
77 * =pam_sm_close_session
78 * !PAM_IGNORE
79 * PAM_BAD_CONSTANT
80 */
81
82/**
83 * The =pam_close_session function tears down the user session previously
84 * set up by =pam_open_session.
85 *
86 * The =flags argument is the binary or of zero or more of the following
87 * values:
88 *
89 * =PAM_SILENT:
90 * Do not emit any messages.
91 *
92 * If any other bits are set, =pam_close_session will return
93 * =PAM_BAD_CONSTANT.
94 */
95
